value.stringValue:
AND ( NOT([Opportunity].LastModifiedBy.BypassWF__c ), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].SPO_Exo__c, 'Yes' ), OR ( AND ( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c )) , 'EXO')) ) ), AND ( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c )) , 'EXO')) ) ), AND ( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c )) , 'EXO')) ) ), AND ( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c )) , 'EXO')) ) ), AND ( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c )) , 'EXO')) ) ) )
)

formulas.expression:
AND ( NOT({!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.BypassWF__c} ), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.SPO_Exo__c}, 'Yes' ), OR ( AND ( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c} ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c} )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c} )) , 'EXO')) ) ), AND ( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c} ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c} )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c} )) , 'EXO')) ) ), AND ( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c} ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c} )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c} )) , 'EXO')) ) ), AND ( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c} ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c} )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c} )) , 'EXO')) ) ), AND ( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c} ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c} )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c} )) , 'EXO')) ) ) )
)

value.stringValue: AND ( NOT([Opportunity].LastModifiedBy.BypassWF__c ), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].SPO_Exo__c, 'No' ), OR( AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c ))), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c )) , 'EXO') ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c ))), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c )) , 'EXO') ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c ))), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c )) , 'EXO') ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c ))), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c )) , 'EXO') ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c ))), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT([Opportunity].SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c )) , 'EXO') ) ) )

formulas.expression: AND ( NOT({!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.BypassWF__c} ), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.SPO_Exo__c}, 'No' ), OR( AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c} ))), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c} ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c} )) , 'EXO') ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c} ))), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c} ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c} )) , 'EXO') ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c} ))), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c} ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c} )) , 'EXO') ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c} ))), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c} ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c} )) , 'EXO') ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c} ))), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c} ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!myVariable_current.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c} )) , 'EXO') ) ) )
